mapper.update: update maps set mapname = #{mapname}, userid = #{userid}, accessibility = #{accessibility}, addable = #{addable}, layertree = #{layertree}, basemapid = #{basemapid}, mapstyle = #{mapstyle} where id = #{id}
update maplayer set mapid = #{mapid}, layerid = #{layerid}, state = #{state}, style = #{style}, zIndex = #{zIndex} where mlid = #{mlid}
mapper.select: select mlid,id, CASE WHEN state THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as state, CASE WHEN accessibility THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as accessibility, style,zindex,layername,userid,storelocation,type from maplayer,layers where maplayer.mapid=#{value} and maplayer.layerid = layers.id;
